about.title: About CarWash ðŸš—
about.mission: Our mission is to provide the finest car care services with state-of-the-art facilities and a passion for excellence.
about.intro: At CarWash, we believe your vehicle deserves the best. Our team is dedicated to delivering a sparkling clean car, every time, with eco-friendly products and a smile.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.desc: We use only the highest quality products and equipment.

eco.title: Eco-Friendly
eco.desc: Our cleaning products are safe for your car and the environment.

quick.title: Quick Service
quick.desc: Get your car washed and detailed in record time.

story.title: Our Story
story.desc: Founded in 2023, CarWash started as a small family business with a big dream: to make car care easy, affordable, and enjoyable for everyone.
story.content: Today, our passionate team serves hundreds of happy customers every month. We're proud to be a part of your community and look forward to keeping your car looking its best!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.desc: We'd love to hear from you!

services.title: Our Car Wash Services
